query:
-- Validar estrutura completa
SELECT 
  'Pesquisa' as entidade,
  p.id,
  p.nome,
  p.totalClientes,
  NULL as pesquisaId
FROM pesquisas p
WHERE p.id = 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Clientes' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as id,
  'Total linkados' as nome,
  NULL as totalClientes,
  pesquisaId
FROM clientes
WHERE projectId = 1
GROUP BY pesquisaId

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Mercados' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as id,
  'Total' as nome,
  NULL as totalClientes,
  pesquisaId
FROM mercados_unicos
WHERE projectId = 1
GROUP BY pesquisaId

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Produtos' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as id,
  'Total' as nome,
  NULL as totalClientes,
  pesquisaId
FROM produtos
WHERE projectId = 1
GROUP BY pesquisaId

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Concorrentes' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as id,
  'Total' as nome,
  NULL as totalClientes,
  pesquisaId
FROM concorrentes
WHERE projectId = 1
GROUP BY pesquisaId

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Leads' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as id,
  'Total' as nome,
  NULL as totalClientes,
  pesquisaId
FROM leads
WHERE projectId = 1
GROUP BY pesquisaId;
